title: Rito please give me a key :'(
body:
^^
mean rito tempted me with a key fragment yesterday after my first aram game. so today i went on a magical journey of grinding arams to get that one last keyfragment before i get an awesome skin (like caterpillar kog'maw) but 1 day later, nothing...NOTHING WHY RITO?!!! my day is gone and that spot i saved in my heart for that last key fragment has been crushed. 
all jokes aside, at least i got to play tonnes of the same champ that i really hate (vayne) and now i think i can adc yay.
oh and btw, since my last key fragment, i went up 2 levels, got  3 pentas and a quadra, some s ranks for champs i already got the boxes for, a ton of ip (but most of all, a ready crap mood)
+ night raven fiora is hot (that's why i'm selling her back to riot for 375 yellow essence)

anyways, plizz gif meh wun key fwagment rito
i pray to god - the god who ignores you when you pray to them - that god.
which means i just wasted 5 mins of my life typing this bc i got nothing out of this (except the urge to go to the toilet)
ok fml im out

replies.body:
I only ARAM, where key frag drops were added prior to champ mastery, so I built up a stockpile.
I have 12 keys + a frag or two atm... just need to get some more chests to open.
U mad bro?
If only I was good enough to get S grades on more champs, not just many S with the same champ :(
oh damn. you've got the highest aram win count i've ever seen. you're my new idol

> [{quoted}](name=TheOneUser,realm=OCE,application-id=Ntey9fRZ,discussion-id=keGwl6L5,comment-id=00010000,timestamp=2016-08-22T06:11:54.504+0000)
>
> oh damn. you've got the highest aram win count i've ever seen. you're my new idol

The people I play with have more.
I have 6 key fragments and no chests kind of annoying
